 1998-20801998-11-240,  ,  ,  ,  HRD
PrecisReappointment of ALLAN BRYDEN, of Sydney, Nova Scotia, as Chairperson of the Boards of Referees for the Nova Scotia Regional Division, and particularly for the District of Sydney, for a term of three years, effective December 19, 1998.
